SEARCH
Package catan.ceng.catanui.shape

Class Settlement

java.lang.Object
catan.ceng.catanui.shape.Settlement
public class Settlement extends Object
The Settlement class represents a settlement or city on a Catan board. It contains information about its position, owner, and whether it is a city or not. The settlement is initially created as a triangular structure and can be upgraded to a city as a square later.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new settlement with the specified center coordinates.

  • Constructor Details

    • Settlement

      public Settlement(double centerX, double centerY)
      Constructs a new settlement with the specified center coordinates.
      Parameters:
      centerX - The x-coordinate of the center.
      centerY - The y-coordinate of the center.

  • Method Details

    • toCity

      public void toCity()
      Upgrades the settlement to a city by changing its structure to a square and increasing its radius. The color of the city depends on its an owner.

    • isCity

      public boolean isCity()
      Checks if the settlement has been upgraded to a city.
      Returns:
      true if the settlement is a city, false otherwise.

    • getCity

      public javafx.scene.shape.Polygon getCity()
      Gets the polygon representation of the city structure.
      Returns:
      The city polygon, or null if it is not a city.

    • setOwner

      public void setOwner(CatanPlayer owner)
      Sets the owner of the settlement or city and updates its appearance (color) accordingly.
      Parameters:
      owner - The player who owns the settlement or city.

    • getOwner

      public CatanPlayer getOwner()
      Gets the owner of the settlement or city.
      Returns:
      The player who owns the settlement or city.

    • getSettlement

      public javafx.scene.shape.Polygon getSettlement()
      Gets the polygon representation of the settlement.
      Returns:
      The settlement polygon.

    • getCenterX

      public double getCenterX()
      Gets the x-coordinate of the center of the settlement or city.
      Returns:
      The x-coordinate of the center.

    • getCenterY

      public double getCenterY()
      Gets the y-coordinate of the center of the settlement or city.
      Returns:
      The y-coordinate of the center.

    • ontop

      public boolean ontop(double centerX1, double centerY1)
      Checks if the settlement or city is on top of the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      centerX1 - The x-coordinate of the point to be checked.
      centerY1 - The y-coordinate of the point to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the settlement or city is on top of the specified coordinates, false otherwise.
